      • setConfigProperty

        public static java.lang.String setConfigProperty(java.lang.String key,
                                                 java.lang.String value)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Sets a Config property value

        The Config instance is initialized once on startup which means that its properties don't change throughout its lifetime. This method allows a Config property to be changed temporarily for testing purposes

        Parameters:
        key - The key of the property (eg Config.LOGGERLEVEL)
        value - The new value
        Returns:
        The previous value
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
